rows.label: xs00010100_MSG0002
rows.name:
Earth became caught in the crossfire of a battle
between mysterious alien civilizations.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00010100_MSG0003
rows.name: The battle involved weapons far surpassing our own technological level.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00010100_MSG0004
rows.name:
Without ever knowing why, Earth was ravaged,
and the land was reduced to scorched earth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00010100_MSG0005
rows.name:
Having anticipated the conflict spreading to Earth's sphere,
the Coalition Government initiated the Earthlife Colonization Project.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00010100_MSG0006
rows.name:
From major cities across the globe, numerous
interstellar colony ships launched.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00010100_MSG0007
rows.name:
An escape from the home that had nurtured [System:Ruby rt=us ]life[/System:Ruby]
for four and a half billion years.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00010100_MSG0008
rows.name:
However, many of the immigrant ships were shot down
while leaving the gravity sphere, and only a very small number escaped safely.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00010100_MSG0009
rows.name: Our ship, the White Whale, was one of them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00010100_MSG0010
rows.name: Two years had passed since leaving Earth, wandering through space.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00010100_MSG0011
rows.name:
We considered ourselves lucky
to have survived the conflict near Earth, but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00010100_MSG0012
rows.name:
Eventually, the alien civilization's pursuit forces
caught up to us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00010100_MSG0013
rows.name:
Thanks to the military's desperate counterattack and the efforts of a single hero,
the pursuers were driven back, however...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00010100_MSG0014
rows.name:
The fierce battle severely damaged
the White Whale's main engines.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00010100_MSG0015
rows.name:
The White Whale, having lost its navigational capabilities,
was caught by the gravity of an unknown planet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00010100_MSG0016
rows.name: Its hull breaking apart, the ship plummeted downwards.[ST:wait ]
